member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_D3D11_OPTIONS4
member.summary: Describes Direct3D 11.4 feature options in the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D11_FEATURE_DATA_D3D11_OPTIONS4.ExtendedNV12SharedTextureSupported
member.summary: Specifies a BOOL that determines if NV12 textures can be shared across processes and D3D devices.
